entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: What is your chapter or legion again ?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#1
entry.value: Hmm... too bad, it seems I already have some helmets from your chapter, Space Marines.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#2
entry.value: Humans are so weak but so intriguing.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#3
entry.value: I hope that among the faithful of the Imperium there are exceptional specimens worth immortalizing.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedUnit:Necrons/Orikan#0
entry.value: So Orikan, when is our next trial?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedUnit:Necrons/Orikan#4
entry.value: Admit it Orikan, you can't do nothing without me.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedUnit:Necrons/Orikan#2
entry.value: What did you steal from me this time, Astromancer ?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedUnit:Necrons/Orikan#3
entry.value: I have not forgotten the destruction of your last visit to my house, Astromancer.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedUnit:Necrons/Orikan#4
entry.value: Still not become a light being, Orikan ?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyUnit:Necrons/Orikan#0
entry.value: So Orikan, when is our next trial?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyUnit:Necrons/Orikan#4
entry.value: Admit it Orikan, you can't do nothing without me.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyUnit:Necrons/Orikan#2
entry.value: What did you steal from me this time, Astromancer ?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyUnit:Necrons/Orikan#3
entry.value: I have not forgotten the destruction of your last visit to my house, Astromancer.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyUnit:Necrons/Orikan#4
entry.value: Still not become a light being, Orikan ?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: Humans are so weak but so intriguing.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:AlliedFaction:AstraMilitarum#1
entry.value: I hope that among the faithful of the Imperium there are exceptional specimens worth immortalizing.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: Humans are so weak but so intriguing.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#1
entry.value: I hope that among the faithful of the Imperium there are exceptional specimens worth immortalizing.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:ChaosSpaceMarines#0
entry.value: The corrupted humans are here, if only i could get my hands on Abaddon

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:ChaosSpaceMarines#1
entry.value: The Chaos Astartes share similarities with Orikan, they are horrifying and completely insane.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: Finally a new opportunity to capture a Gorkanaut, I didn't have the opportunity last time.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:Orks#1
entry.value: Ah, more Orks. Maybe i'll still get a statue.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:Orks#2
entry.value: I hope you have a Gorkanaut with you. One is missing from my Ork gallery.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: What is your chapter or legion again ?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#1
entry.value: Hmm... too bad, it seems I already have some helmets from your chapter, Space Marines.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#2
entry.value: Humans are so weak but so intriguing.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#3
entry.value: I hope that among the faithful of the Imperium there are exceptional specimens worth immortalizing.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: Other Necrons, it remains to be seen if they will be as open minded as me.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:EnemyFaction:Necrons#1
entry.value: I wonder if these Necrons would agree to visit my galleries.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Artefact#0
entry.value: Lead me to this artifact, I just want to study it. I swear.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Artefact#1
entry.value: Yet another new find to preserve. Let's hurry.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Artefact#2
entry.value: Quickly ! Collect the artifact before Orikan pulls the rug out from under me !

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Attack#0
entry.value: I'm loath to fight, but so be it.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Attack#1
entry.value: I am not a warrior, I am an archeovist.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Attack#2
entry.value: Why do I have to fight ?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Attack#3
entry.value: Are you wasting my skills on such a futile task ?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Attack#4
entry.value: I could have sent my troops instead.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Cover#0
entry.value: Well sheltered, as usual.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Hurt#0
entry.value: I have a plan. I always have a plan.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Hurt#1
entry.value: Maybe it's time to use my cloack to get out of this mess.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Hurt#2
entry.value: Luckily I have another envelope not far away.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Hurt#3
entry.value: Death is overrated. I am immortal and infinite.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#0
entry.value: I am revered by the Imperium, I even had a statue. Which I recovered, obviously.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#1
entry.value: Have I ever told you how I killed a giant saurian with my barge ?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#2
entry.value: I hope Solemnace's defenses hold up in my absence.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#3
entry.value: Has anyone seen Orikan ? I'm sure he's up to bother me again.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#4
entry.value: If you find a valuable target, let me know.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#5
entry.value: A new planet, new cultures and new conservation opportunities.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#6
entry.value: This world is...strange.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#7
entry.value: I've been here before but the place has changed a lot since then.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#8
entry.value: Have you heard this melody ?

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#9
entry.value: Ah, I miss my Tanith marching band.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#10
entry.value: Someone broke my stained glass window, I guess Orikan had something to do with it.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#11
entry.value: Since waking up, I've been overwhelmed by obligations... when will I have time to find other subjects ??

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Idle#12
entry.value: My cloack ? Ready. My stick ? Ready. Mazes Tesseracts ? Readies.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Victory#0
entry.value: What a waste, you would have had your place in my galleries.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Victory#1
entry.value: I'm not sure you're worth the right to be immortalized.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Victory#2
entry.value: It was easy and disappointing.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Victory#3
entry.value: A fleeting distraction.

entry.name: Necrons/Trazyn:Victory#4
entry.value: You could have been so much more than my victims.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: A pile of muscle without brains, I have come to appreciate the calm that reigns among our lifeless legions.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:AlliedFaction:SpaceMarines#1
entry.value: Humanity is weak, gullible and without a future.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:AlliedFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: Humans are truly ugly and useless creatures. A bit like Trazyn.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:AlliedFaction:AstraMilitarum#1
entry.value: Humanity is weak, gullible and without a future.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:AlliedFaction:AdeptusMechanicus#0
entry.value: The Mechanicus... a group of children who would like to be like us but who respect a sterile and futile dogma.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:AlliedFaction:AdeptusMechanicus#1
entry.value: You have to be an idiot to worship machines rather than your own knowledge.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:AdeptusMechanicus#0
entry.value: Le Mechanicus... une bande d'enfant qui aimerait nous ressembler mais qui respecte un dogme stérile et futile.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:AdeptusMechanicus#1
entry.value: Il faut être idiot pour vénérer les machines plutôt que son propre savoir.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#0
entry.value: Humans are truly ugly and useless creatures. A bit like Trazyn.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:AstraMilitarum#1
entry.value: L'humanité est faible, crédule et sans avenir.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyUnit:Necrons/Trazyn#0
entry.value: What are you going to do this time, Trazyn ? A new joke leading to another Exterminatus ?

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyUnit:Necrons/Trazyn#1
entry.value: Still plotting behind my back, Trazyn ?

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyUnit:Necrons/Trazyn#2
entry.value: Holding on to the past won't save the future, Trazyn.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:AlliedUnit:Necrons/Trazyn#0
entry.value: What are you going to do this time, Trazyn ? A new joke leading to another Exterminatus ?

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:AlliedUnit:Necrons/Trazyn#1
entry.value: Still plotting behind my back, Trazyn ?

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:AlliedUnit:Necrons/Trazyn#2
entry.value: Holding on to the past won't save the future, Trazyn.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:ChaosSpaceMarines#0
entry.value: Argh... is there a worse anomaly than this band of corrupt depraved people ?

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:Tyranids#0
entry.value: The Tyranids... when I think that Trazyn had fun playing a joke on me with one of them and that he almost condemned an entire planet.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:Orks#0
entry.value: The Orks spend their time wreaking havoc on my calculations.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#0
entry.value: A pile of muscle without brains, I have come to appreciate the calm that reigns among our lifeless legions.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:SpaceMarines#1
entry.value: Humanity is weak, gullible and without a future.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:Necrons#0
entry.value: Ah, those of our people. Am I the only one who understands our real future in this galaxy ?

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:EnemyFaction:Necrons#1
entry.value: This silent swarm that dares to call itself Necrons doesn't even deserve my attention.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Artefact#0
entry.value: Captivating, fascinating and ancient... I need this artifact now.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Artefact#1
entry.value: What mathematical treasure will I discover within this ancient discovery ?

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Attack#0
entry.value: You are an anomaly, and you must die for it.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Attack#1
entry.value: The future demands your destruction.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Attack#2
entry.value: The stars demand your annihilation.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Attack#3
entry.value: I would just have to imagine that you are Trazyn.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Attack#4
entry.value: Suffer and fear me.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Shaken#0
entry.value: The stars... are no longer aligned.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Shaken#1
entry.value: I won't spend a millennium under rubble, not yet !

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Broken#0
entry.value: I failed...the galaxy will pay the price.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Broken#1
entry.value: My calculations have been distorted, everything is lost.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Cover#0
entry.value: I'm going to take shelter while my necroderm can repair itself.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Hurt#0
entry.value: Adaptation of the Chronosens...

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Hurt#1
entry.value: Necroderm under repair.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Idle#0
entry.value: Visiting Solemnace is overrated, and again I weigh my words.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Idle#1
entry.value: When an anomaly interferes with my calculations, it's because Trazyn is not far away.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Idle#2
entry.value: I beat you, Vishani.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Idle#3
entry.value: I am the Supreme Chronomancer, the greatest of the Crypteks.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Idle#4
entry.value: I am the only one to have solved the Vishanic riddles.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Idle#5
entry.value: The Necrontyrs must become light beings.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Idle#6
entry.value: I am Orikan, the Diviner.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Victory#0
entry.value: You cannot undo what I have written.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Victory#1
entry.value: Victory goes to those who can seize it.

entry.name: Necrons/Orikan:Victory#2
entry.value: I have had centuries to prepare for this victory.
